## Airbnb 2019 Dataset until 2019/Sep
```{r}
## download the file
if(!file.exists("AB_NYC_2019.csv")){
        unzip("AB_NYC_2019.csv.zip")
}
## read the csv file
airbnbny <- read.csv("AB_NYC_2019.csv")
airbnbny$location <- paste(airbnbny$latitude, ":", airbnbny$longitude)
summary(airbnbny)
```
